abstract: Zeta Beta Tau fraternity at University of Florida ousts three members for allegedly spewing booze-soaked insults toward disabled veterans at a Florida resort.
lead_paragraph: A University of Florida fraternity expelled three of its members Friday after allegations that they hurled insults and spat at a group of disabled military veterans at a Panama City resort.

headline.main: Florida: Fraternity Expels 3 After Abuse of Veterans
headline.print_headline: Florida: Fraternity Expels 3 Members Accused of Insulting Veterans

snippet: A University of Florida fraternity expelled three of its members Friday after allegations that they hurled insults and spat at a group of disabled military veterans at a Panama City resort.
